songs.title: Still in Love With You
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
She was all I ever wanted
She was all I ever needed and more
But she walked out my door

[Pre-Chorus]
Then she went away
Left my heart in two
Left me standing here
Singing all these blues

[Chorus]
You left without a single word
Not even sorry
It might've hurt worse to hear you say
I'm leaving, goodbye
But your smile still makes my heart sing
Another sad song
I can't forget it
I won't regret it
'Cause I'm still in love with you

[Verse 2]
We had fun under the sun
And when winter came, she'd be my angel
We were so in love

[Pre-Chorus]
Then, she went away
Left my heart in two
Left me standing here
Singing all these blues, yeah

[Chorus]
You left without a single word
Not even sorry
It might've hurt worse to hear you say
I'm leaving, goodbye
But your smile still makes my heart sing
Another sad song
I can't forget it
I won't regret it
'Cause I'm still in love with you
Still in love with you

[Bridge]
I don't know what hurts worse, baby
Seeing you with him or being alone
On my own
I know he doesn't love you, baby
Not like I did
Oh, what's the point?
You're not listening anyway

[Chorus]
You left without a single word
Not even sorry
It might've hurt worse to hear you say
I'm leaving, goodbye
But your smile still makes my heart sing
Another sad song
I can't forget it
I won't regret it
'Cause I'm still in love with you
You left without a single word
Not even sorry
It might've hurt worse to hear you say
I'm leaving, goodbye
But your smile still makes my heart sing
Another sad song
I can't forget it
I won't regret it
'Cause I'm still in love with you
